terminologie_extrait.definition: A serve that, if allowed, would bounce twice on the far side of the table.

debutant.description: Serve with open racket, brushing the BOTTOM of the ball. Try to make the ball barely clear the net.

intermediaire.description: Put sidespin on the backspin serve by brushing the ball from side to side. Experiment until it feels right.
Contact the ball with your racket going diagonally sideways and up. This action will make the ball pop up and go deep at first.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice serving short backspin serves with an open racket, brushing the BOTTOM of the ball. Try to make the ball barely clear the net.

metriques_progression: Practice with maximum spin on all types of serves

erreurs_a_eviter.conseil: Practice serving short to improve touch
